name: LSD Dream Emulator
description:
Back in 1998 on October 22nd. LSD Dream Emulator was released for PS1 in Japan mainly as a exploration game, filled with surreal environments with no objective. The overall experience is based off of a dream "diary" (journal) kept by a Asmik Ace employee "Hiroko Nishikawa" for nearly over a decade.

I didn't develop this game, therefore I am not asking for any profits.

The file uploaded contains most of what is needed to play the game. 

Platforms: Win64, Win32
